jobs_results.title: (Mid/Senior) iOS Developer -  Exchange App
jobs_results.description:
About the role:

As part of our team, you will focus on developing best-in-class iOS applications using a modern tech stack. Our apps are built entirely in Swift and follow an MVVM architecture. We rely heavily on RxSwift and are incorporating more SwiftUI across the project. Experience with reactive programming and SwiftUI is a plus.

The difference you will make:
‚Ä¢ Collaborate closely with members of tech & product in a cross-functional feature team to develop innovative features for a large global user base
‚Ä¢ Analyse product requirements and designs provided by product owners, providing valuable feedback based on your expertise in iOS development
‚Ä¢ Deliver high-quality, modularised, and scalable code that is maintainable and testable within reasonable timelines
‚Ä¢ Engage in regular sync-ups with not only your feature team, but also the entire iOS team, ensuring that your ideas and insights are heard and valued

Your expertise:
‚Ä¢ Minimum of 4 years of full-time iOS development experience (no upper limit)
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Swift, UIKit and a solid understanding of iOS development best practices
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with MVVM architecture (experience with RxSwift and SwiftUI is highly desirable)
‚Ä¢ Experience in writing unit tests and snapshot/UI tests
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Git and familiarity with branching models such as Git-flow, Trunk Based Development, etc
‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for continuous learning
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and collaboration abilities
‚Ä¢ A focus on producing high-quality code and exceptional user experiences
‚Ä¢ Candidates with more experience will be considered as senior developer

If you are a motivated and talented iOS developer who thrives in a collaborative environment, we would love to hear from you.Join our team and contribute to building cutting-edge mobile applications that make a difference.Please include examples of your work or links to your portfolio with your application.

Life @ Crypto.com

Empowered to think big. Try new opportunities while working with a talented, ambitious and supportive team.

Transformational and proactive working environment. Elevate employees to find thoughtful and innovative solutions.

Growth from within. We help to develop new skill-sets that would impact the shaping of your personal and professional growth.

Work Culture. Our colleagues are some of the best in the industry; we are all here to help and support one another.

One cohesive team. Engage stakeholders to achieve our ultimate goal - Cryptocurrency in every wallet.

Are you ready to kickstart your future with us?

Benefits

Competitive salary

Medical insurance package with extended coverage to dependents

Attractive annual leave entitlement including: birthday, work anniversary

Work Flexibility Adoption. Flexi-work hour and hybrid or remote set-up

Aspire career alternatives through us. Our internal mobility program can offer employees a diverse scope.

Work Perks: crypto.com visa card provided upon joining

Our Crypto.com benefits packages vary depending on region requirements, you can learn more from our talent acquisition team.

About Crypto.com:

Founded in 2016, Crypto.com serves more than 80 million customers and is the world's fastest growing global cryptocurrency platform. Our vision is simple: Cryptocurrency in Every Wallet‚Ñ¢. Built on a foundation of security, privacy, and compliance, Crypto.com is committed to accelerating the adoption of cryptocurrency through innovation and empowering the next generation of builders, creators, and entrepreneurs to develop a fairer and more equitable digital ecosystem.

Learn more at https://crypto.com.

Crypto.com is an equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating an environment where opportunities are presented to everyone in a fair and transparent way. Crypto.com values diversity and inclusion, seeking candidates with a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills that complement and strengthen our team.

Personal data provided by applicants will be used for recruitment purposes only.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer Swift
jobs_results.description:
iOS Developer WfH / London to ¬£55k

iOS Developer / Mobile Engineer (Swift Objective-C) *Remote / WfH*. Would you like to utilise and develop your skills working on a highly secure Greenfield ‚Äútrack and trace‚Äù app intended to help fight the spread of COVID-19 whilst assuring users of its security?

As an iOS Developer you‚Äôll design, implement, test and maintain the iOS codebase for mobile devices using Swift; you‚Äôll be working across the full development lifecycle from understanding requirements through to delivery of well tested mobile apps. You‚Äôll collaborate with a cross functional Agile team, partnering with UI/UX and QA and work closely with the Head of Mobile to drive best practice, clean coding and self-improvement.

This is a great opportunity to join a growing tech company working on digital personal identification and protection software; you‚Äôll be continually learning through innovation and progressing your career.

Driven by technology this company is able to offer a remote interview / onboarding process and the ability to work from home fulltime, permanently with the caveat that you‚Äôll visit the London office around 2-4 times a month.

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ You have strong Swift experience, Objective-C also nice to have but you‚Äôll be using Swift going forward
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre an advocate of clean coding practices, architecture and design; with TDD and Pair Programming experience
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre experienced with professional mobile app delivery (i.e. delivery to the store, maintenance, bug fixing, refactoring)
‚Ä¢ You have experience across the full development lifecycle
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre collaborative with great communication skills

As an iOS Developer / Mobile Engineer you will earn a competitive salary (to ¬£55k) plus benefits.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer - Spanish/English - Full Remote
IOS Developer Wide‚Äã/Once a 1‚Äã/office
jobs_results.description:
Position: iOS Developer Wide (Once a 1/4 in the office)
iOS Developer, UK Wide (Once a 1/4 in the office)

Fantastic opportunity for an experienced Lead iOS Developer to join a well-renowned digital transformation agency with considerable UK presence, having offices in London, Manchester, Liverpool & Edinburgh. They have adopted a hybrid working model, working with you on how you‚Äôd like to return to work, with a minimum expectancy of once a quarter in the office most local to you.

Even though large, they still have a small company feel with wide expertise, supporting in data, web, mobile, and strategy. They work with several household names, giving you exposure to work on revolutionary products using the latest technology suitable for the project in hand.

The iOS tribe currently consists of 15 team members, with space for another 5 hires, one of which is this position. A mix of experience levels exists, with a Head of Mobile and another Tech Lead helping shape the way in which the business works within mobile and future technologies.

You will be working within joint client teams to help deliver solutions, solving problems. Strong communication skills and excitement about new technologies within the mobile space are essential. This position is a great chance to progress your career; you don‚Äôt need to be the finished article, just a great communicator with a mix of soft skills and technical knowledge. This position offers a lot of space to shape your development and career path before moving to senior.

Skills:
‚Ä¢ Architectural understanding and use of approaches like MVC, MVP & MVVM

In return, they are offering a salary of up to ¬£65,000 per annum plus generous company benefits and flexible working!

If you‚Äôre interested in this opportunity and would like to know more, please either contact me directly or apply through this advert, and I will contact you ASAP.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer Swift ‚Äì Open Banking App
jobs_results.description:
iOS Developer Remote / WfH / London to ¬£70k

iOS Developer / Mobile Engineer (iOS Swift) *Remote / WfH*. Would you like to work on Greenfield applications at a fast growing Open Banking FinTech start-up? You‚Äôll take ownership, quickly see the impact of your work and be instrumental in the company‚Äôs growth ‚Äì quickly progressing your career.

As an iOS Developer you‚Äôll be to creating native app experiences for users, ensuring they are fast, responsive and easy to use. You‚Äôll be collaborating with a small team including UI/UX Designers, Product and Engineering teams and working with a great deal of autonomy, you‚Äôll be able to influence the technical direction working on a healthy pipeline of Greenfield projects with no legacy code.

You‚Äôll be part of a small team of tech and finance entrepreneurs building solutions to help streamline the payments process for both businesses and personal users; the company is well backed and set to be highly successful.

You can enjoy a range of perks including personal training budget, employee care packages, a new MacBook Pro to work on as well as summer and Christmas parties.

There‚Äôs a remote interview and onboarding process as well as the ability to work from home full-time with the caveat that following social distancing measures you‚Äôll meet up with the team once or twice a month in the London office.

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ You have strong native iOS development experience using Swift with frameworks / tools such as Core Data ORM and Codable
‚Ä¢ You have experience of integrating with REST APIs
‚Ä¢ You have experience of building and releasing apps on the AppStore
‚Ä¢ You have a good knowledge of responsive design principles
‚Ä¢ You have experience with unit testing tools
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre collaborative, with a genuine enthusiasm for technology; excited by the idea of working for a growing start-up where you can make a difference
